hasMessage.hasTextContent: Dabigatran   is predicted to   increase   the risk of bleeding events when given with   venlafaxine .  Manufacturer advises use with caution or avoid .

hasDitaContent.@value: Verapamil increases the exposure to dabigatran. Manufacturer advises adjust dabigatran dose.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Verapamil   increases   the exposure to   dabigatran .  Manufacturer advises adjust  dabigatran  dose .

hasDitaContent.@value: Dabigatran is predicted to increase the risk of bleeding events when given with vortioxetine. Manufacturer advises use with caution or avoid.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Dabigatran   is predicted to   increase   the risk of bleeding events when given with   vortioxetine .  Manufacturer advises use with caution or avoid .

hasDitaContent.@value: Voxilaprevir (with sofosbuvir and velpatasvir) increases the concentration of dabigatran. Manufacturer advises avoid.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Voxilaprevir   (with sofosbuvir and velpatasvir)   increases   the concentration of   dabigatran .  Manufacturer advises avoid .

hasDitaContent.@value: Both dabigatran and warfarin can increase the risk of bleeding.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  dabigatran  and  warfarin  can increase the risk of bleeding.
